textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Italian sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Length: 24in / 61cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in Italy. Dry clean. 100% silk. Fabric: Silk georgette. The crisp silhouette of this VIKTOR & ROLF blouse has a soft, romantic feel in sheer silk georgette. Delicate, raw-edge pleats form opaque zigzag stripes at the front, and the layered, pointed collar lends a sharp edge along the neckline. Hidden buttons close the placket, and the long sleeves end in buttoned cuffs. Sheer. Description Blouses > Tops > Clothing > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Viktor Horsting and Rolf Snoeren were studying at Arnhem Academy of Art and Design in The Netherlands when they began working together. After relocating to Paris in 1993 and focusing on couture, they grabbed the attention of the fashion world and beyond by experimenting with scale and presentation. The unorthodox nature of their designs merged apparel and art, bringing VIKTOR & ROLF to the forefront of high fashion. In 2009 they received Dutch fashion's highest distinction, the MODINT Grand Seigneur award.
